knimeNode.name: Envision Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription:
Reads a list of Envision result files into Knime. Files are grouped according to their file names, which are suppossed to follow the pattern: "$Barcode$__$ATTRIBUTE-NAME$.xls(x)". So, the only assumption it makes it that the parameter-name comes last in the file-name and is separated with an underscore.
If input-files do NOT foolow this scheme, the node will create a single readout-attribute called "Envision Readout".

fullDescription.intro: Reads a list of exported Envision result files into Knime.
fullDescription.option:
There are two modes of operation. Either you can choose a single directory in which the nodes will search for Envision files. The search is applied not only to the direct directory contents but also to also its subfolders.
The second mode is to select a set of files (by keeping the apple/windows-key pressed while selecting files).
